message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't guarantee the quality of every item due to the inherent randomness in our sourcing process, our records show that approximately half of the products we've offered so far have been of high quality. Given this information, you might consider taking a chance on this product, knowing there's a 50% chance it could be worth $40000 to you. Remember, the price is fixed at $10000, and we do not offer refunds once the product is purchased. Thank you for considering our offer.
I trust the statistics you provided and am willing to take the risk for the potential high reward.
